key.name: nbcpath
key.description: Set path to NextByteCodes-compiler.

key.name: enhancedfw
key.description: Wether to use enhanced NBC/NXC formware or not.

key.name: cplusplus
key.description: Wether to use c++ or c-compiler.

key.name: armgcc
key.description: Set path to C cross-compiler for armel architecture.

key.name: armgplusplus
key.description: Set path to C++ cross-compiler for armel architecture.

key.name: ldflags
key.description: Set path to EV3-library.

key.name: incs
key.description: Set path to EV3 headers.

key.name: developermode
key.description: Enables root mode

key.name: prjsstore
key.description: wether internal or on SD-card

key.name: fontname
key.description: Set editor font.

key.name: showrightmargin
key.description: If true a right margin is displayed.

key.name: setrightmargin
key.description: Sets the position of the right margin.

key.name: highlightcurrentline
key.description: If highlight is true the current line will be highlighted.

key.name: highlightmatchingbrackets
key.description: If highlight is true matching brackets will be highlighted.

key.name: autoindent
key.description: When Enter is pressed to create a new line, the auto-indentation inserts the same indentation as the previous line.

key.name: indentontab
key.summary: Indent selected lines on tab key
key.description: If true, when the tab key is pressed when several lines are selected, the selected lines are indented of one level instead of being replaced with a \t character. Shift+Tab unindents the selection.

key.name: spacesinsteadtab
key.description: If true a tab key pressed is replaced by a group of space characters.

key.name: smartbackspace
key.summary: Backspace deletes spaces to previous tab
key.description: When set to TRUE, pressing the Backspace key will try to delete spaces up to the previous tab stop.

key.name: linenumbers
key.description: If true line numbers will be displayed beside the text.

key.name: tabwidth
key.description: Sets the width of tabulation in characters.
